thread.title: San Antonio woman makes $80 an hour as professional cuddler
thread.title_full: San Antonio woman makes $80 an hour as professional cuddler

author: Liz Farmer
title: San Antonio woman makes $80 an hour as professional cuddler
text:
San Antonio woman makes $80 an hour as professional cuddler Filed under Texas at Get Daily Dallas News Headlines Sign Up Get Unlimited Digital Access Your first month is less than a dollar. $0.99 for first 4 weeks Subscribe Now 
Janet Trevino 
A San Antonio woman earns a living by professionally cuddling people â yes, spooning them â for $80 per hour. 
Janet Trevino offers her services through cuddlist.com , which markets itself as a way to book a "non-sexual, cuddle session with a certified professional cuddler," according to its site. 
Some weeks, Trevino makes up to $1,600, The San Antonio Express-News reports . 
Clients go through a screening process and must agree to a code of conduct before they begin sessions, which Trevino said are nurturing for mental and physical health, KSAT-TV reports . 
"It can be lying around, it can be doing a lot of talking," Trevino said. "We can watch movies. Just imagine what you can do having that human contact." 
Trevino said cuddling comes with a host of health benefits, including stress relief and a boost to the immune and cardiovascular systems. 
"We hold memories in our muscles and our bodies," she said. "Those emotions are there and a lot of people don't want to go there." 
Since beginning last September, she's gained 50 clients. 
They meet in the living room of a house Trevino uses specifically for work. 
Trevino says on her cuddle.com profile that upon arrival, clients can expect water or iced tea, discussion about music preferences and essential oils. She suggests that people bring special pillow, blankets, books or movies that make them comfortable. 
"Learning to communicate from the moment you arrive is all a part of the whole cuddling experience," she wrote. "We craft not only how to cuddle but what we do while we hold each other!" View Comments
